points.0: 1. Last weekend, I visited the zoo with my family.
points.1: 2. I saw many animals like lions, tigers, elephants, and monkeys.
points.2: 3. My favorite animal was the giraffe because of its long neck.
points.3: 4. I also learned about different birds and reptiles.

points.1: 2. We celebrate it every year with joy and excitement.

points.0: 1. Last Sunday, I went to the park with my family.
points.1: 2. The park was full of green trees and beautiful flowers.
points.2: 3. I played on the swings, slides, and ran around the playground.
points.3: 4. We had a picnic with snacks and drinks under a big tree.
